NewsItem.HEADLINE: Fixed Wireless Access 2018
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A comprehensive view of the fixed wireless market for residential and enterprise customers, including 802.11-based, WiMAX, and 3GPP technologies including LTE and 5G.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The five-year forecast (2018-2023) provides breakdowns according to frequency band, region, technology, and other factors. Clear insight into customer growth factors and cost analysis are included.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: WiMAX WiFI FWA LTE 5G NR 5GNR fixed wireless access cable mobile wisp market research forecast cpe cost to connect cost to pass mvno
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: mexp-fwa-18 rev0 ericsson.pdf, mexp-fwa-18 rev0 ericsson.xlsx
